PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_WasteTerminalTypeFloorWaste
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Pipe fitting, set into the floor, that collects waste water and discharges it to a separate trap.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the waste.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length measured along the y-axis in the local coordinate system of the waste.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length measured along the z-axis in the local coordinate system of the waste.

PropertyDef.Name: BodyMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: The primary material used to construct the object

PropertyDef.Name: OutletConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition: Size of the outlet connection from the object

PropertyDef.Name: CoverLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the cover of the waste.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The length measured along the y-axis in the local coordinate system of the cover of the waste.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: Material from which the cover or grating is constructed.
